BaseTemplate.description: Write with Love, Share Everywhere - LovPen Obsidian Plugin

Index.meta_description: Simply input your ideas, LovPen automatically creates content based on your knowledge base, writing style preferences, and target platforms. Supports voice input, conversational editing, and one-click multi-platform distribution.
Index.hero_subtitle: Just speak your ideas, and LovPen will automatically create and format content for different platforms based on your knowledge base and preferred writing style, distributing to WeChat, Xiaohongshu, Jike, Twitter with one click
Index.ai_process_subtitle: From idea to publication, LovPen assists you throughout
Index.features_title: Make LovPen Your Personal Creation Assistant
Index.features_subtitle: Personalized learning, intelligent creation, automated distribution
Index.platforms_title: One-Click Adaptation to All Major Platforms
Index.platforms_subtitle: LovPen automatically optimizes format and style for each platform
Index.cta_title: Enter the LovPen-Driven Era of Creation
Index.cta_subtitle: Let LovPen learn your style and create unique content for you
Index.flow_description_1: Daily inspiration flows through LovPen's intelligent processing
Index.flow_description_2: Creating beautiful content that flows to major platforms with closed-loop optimization
Index.feature_1_description: Like Flomo's inspiration capture, supporting various inputs including voice, text, and images. Record ideas anytime, and LovPen helps you consolidate them into complete articles.
Index.feature_2_description: Intelligently connect scattered thoughts, meeting notes, and reading notes, automatically discover correlations, and organize them into logically clear article structures.
Index.feature_3_description: Supports report documents, PPT outlines, tabular data and other formats, intelligently parsing and transforming them into quality graphic content.
Index.feature_4_description: Automatic illustration, intelligent layout, elegant fonts, generating trustworthy professional-grade graphic content that makes every piece pleasing to the eye.
Index.feature_5_description: Supports 20+ platforms including WeChat Official Account, Zhihu, Xiaohongshu, Twitter, LinkedIn, automatically optimizing content format according to platform characteristics.
Index.feature_6_description: Learn your favorite author styles and expression habits, ensuring output content maintains personal characteristics while conforming to platform tone.
Index.cases_title: LovPen helps everyone become an excellent creator
Index.cases_subtitle: Regardless of your writing foundation, LovPen can help you create professional-level content
Index.case_personal_quote: With LovPen's help, I can maintain high-frequency quality content output. LovPen not only learned my perspective expression but also adjusts content depth and style according to different platform user characteristics.
Index.case_lifestyle_quote: I let LovPen learn the writing styles of several well-known bloggers, and now it can describe my life with warm and delicate brushstrokes. Travel insights, food experiences, LovPen writes more movingly than I do myself.
Index.case_tech_quote: I just need to state the technical points, and LovPen can generate professional technical articles based on my knowledge base. From algorithmic principles to code implementation, LovPen can perfectly present everything in my familiar expression style.
Index.case_business_title: LovPen is our team's content strategist
Index.case_business_quote: LovPen learned our brand tone and customer preferences, generating precise marketing content for different platforms. From serious business analysis to relaxed social media copy, it switches styles effortlessly.
Index.pricing_title: Choose the creation plan that suits you
Index.pricing_subtitle: From individual creators to professional teams, LovPen provides thoughtful service for every stage
Index.about_subtitle: We are committed to making everyone able to easily create professional-level content
Index.about_content_p1: In the era of information explosion, quality content has become more important than ever. However, traditional creation methods are often time-consuming and labor-intensive, preventing many valuable ideas from being expressed in a timely manner.
Index.about_content_p2: LovPen believes that technology should empower creators, not replace them. We help you quickly transform ideas into beautiful graphic content through AI technology, allowing you to focus on the most important things - thinking and innovation.
Index.about_content_p3: Whether you are a personal blogger, knowledge worker, or enterprise content team, LovPen can learn your style, understand your needs, and become your most reliable creative partner.
Index.about_mission_desc: To enable everyone with ideas to easily create professional-level content
Index.about_vision_desc: To become the most trusted intelligent creation platform for global creators
Index.about_values_desc: Create with love, make technology warm hearts

Create.meta_description: 选择你喜欢的方式开始创作，语音、文字、文档或对话，LovPen 让每个想法都能变成精彩内容
Create.hero_subtitle: 选择最适合你的输入方式，让 LovPen 帮你把想法变成精美的图文内容

Profile.title: Profile
Profile.description: Manage your personal information, avatar, and API credentials
Profile.supported_formats: Supports JPEG, PNG, GIF, WebP formats, file size up to 5MB

Counter.security_powered_by: Security, bot detection and rate limiting powered by

CounterForm.presentation: The counter is stored in the database and incremented by the value you provide.

About.meta_description: Learn about LovPen's mission to democratize content creation through AI-powered writing assistance and multi-platform distribution.
About.hero_subtitle: We're building the future of content creation, where anyone can turn their ideas into beautiful, engaging content for any platform.
About.mission_description: To democratize content creation by empowering everyone to express their ideas beautifully and effectively, regardless of their writing experience.
About.mission_point_1_description: Make high-quality content creation accessible to everyone, from beginners to professionals.
About.mission_point_2_description: Seamlessly connect creators with their audiences across all major platforms.
About.mission_point_3_description: Help people share their unique perspectives and knowledge with the world.
About.story_paragraph_1: LovPen was born from a simple observation: great ideas often get lost in translation. We noticed that many talented individuals had valuable insights to share but struggled with the technical aspects of content creation and distribution.
About.story_paragraph_2: Our founding team, with backgrounds in AI, design, and content strategy, came together to solve this problem. We wanted to create a tool that would understand not just what you want to say, but how you want to say it - and then help you say it beautifully.
About.story_paragraph_3: Today, LovPen is used by thousands of creators worldwide, from personal bloggers to enterprise teams, all united by the desire to share their knowledge and connect with their audiences more effectively.
About.value_1_description: We believe that every piece of content should be well-crafted, engaging, and valuable to its audience.
About.value_2_description: Every feature we build is designed with the user experience in mind, making complex tasks simple and intuitive.
About.value_3_description: We're constantly pushing the boundaries of what's possible in AI-assisted content creation.
About.value_4_description: We believe in open, honest communication with our users and within our team.
About.team_member_1_description: Former AI researcher with a passion for making technology accessible to everyone.
About.team_member_2_description: Design strategist focused on creating intuitive and beautiful user experiences.
About.team_member_3_description: Full-stack engineer with expertise in AI and scalable distributed systems.
About.contact_description: Have questions about LovPen or want to learn more about our mission? We'd love to hear from you.

Portfolio.presentation: Welcome to my portfolio page! Here you will find a carefully curated collection of my work and accomplishments. Through this portfolio, I'm to showcase my expertise, creativity, and the value I can bring to your projects.

PortfolioSlug.content: Created a set of promotional materials and branding elements for a corporate event. Crafted a visually unified theme, encompassing a logo, posters, banners, and digital assets. Integrated the client's brand identity while infusing it with a contemporary and innovative approach.

SignIn.meta_description: Seamlessly sign in to your account with our user-friendly login process.

SignUp.meta_description: Effortlessly create an account through our intuitive sign-up process.

Dashboard.alternative_message: Want to build your SaaS faster using the same stack? Try <url></url>.

Features.meta_description: Discover LovPen's powerful features for intelligent content creation and multi-platform distribution.
Features.hero_subtitle: Everything you need to create, style, and distribute your content across multiple platforms.
Features.feature_1_description: Let LovPen understand your writing style and create content that matches your voice.
Features.feature_2_description: Automatically format and publish to WeChat, Xiaohongshu, Zhihu, and Twitter with one click.
Features.feature_3_description: Automatically adjust content format and style for different platforms and audiences.
Features.feature_4_description: Choose from 30+ professionally designed themes and templates for your content.
Features.feature_5_description: Speak your ideas and let LovPen convert them into well-structured written content.
Features.feature_6_description: Connect your personal knowledge base to enrich your content with relevant information.

Docs.meta_description: Complete documentation and guides for getting started with LovPen.
Docs.hero_subtitle: Everything you need to know about using LovPen effectively.
Docs.help_description: Can't find what you're looking for? Our support team is here to help.

Pricing.meta_description: Choose the perfect plan for your content creation needs. Start free, upgrade when you're ready.
Pricing.hero_subtitle: Choose the plan that fits your content creation needs. Start free, upgrade anytime.
Pricing.faq_1_question: Can I change my plan anytime?
Pricing.faq_1_answer: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes take effect immediately.
Pricing.faq_2_question: What payment methods do you accept?
Pricing.faq_2_answer: We accept all major credit cards, PayPal, and bank transfers for enterprise customers.
Pricing.faq_3_answer: Yes, our Free plan lets you try LovPen with no time limit. Upgrade when you're ready for more features.
